trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The brawny Yok Huy knows how to work smarter, not harder.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_TODO_00<tab>Pick up the builder's stone.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_TODO_01<tab>Carry the builder's stone to the designated location.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the good-natured Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_TODO_03<tab>Tell the brawny Yok Huy not to underestimate /me.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_000<tab>Perfect timing, visitor. Have you any interest in a little trial of strength?
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_001<tab>I have here a builder's stone, freshly cut and shaped by yours truly. Let me see you carry it to northwestern Proof, where my good friend awaits.

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_002<tab>That is, unless─well, a Yok Huy like myself could lift it with ease, but I worry that it may be too heavy for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> kind. Are you up to the task, little one?
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_005<tab>By all means, carry this stone to my friend─if you think you can!
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Carry the builder's stone to the good-natured Yok Huy at northwestern Proof before the time runs out.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You will have 120 seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_015<tab>He's supposed to bring the stone in today. What's taking him so long?

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>The impossibly heavy builder's stone slips from your grasp and craters itself into the earth. Try as you might, you cannot pry it back out again. Return to the brawny Yok Huy to obtain another.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_020<tab>Ah, the builder's stone has arrived at last! I am grateful, of course, but also...confused. How did it end up in your hands?
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_022<tab>What!? You mean to tell me that lazy oaf foisted his work onto you!?

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_023<tab>Ugh... These stones are miserable to carry, even for us, so I can only assume he tricked you into it somehow. On his behalf, I offer my sincere apologies.

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_024<tab>Still, you didn't seem to have much difficulty at all. You know, if I were you, I'd march right back to him and say, “Don't underestimate <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>me<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!”

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_GENTLEYOKFUY05042_000_025<tab>One of your strength should have naught to fear from him. I suggest you march right up to him and say, “Don't underestimate <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>me<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!”
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_030<tab>I imagine this task is quite daunting for a puny visitor like you. Feel free to take as much time as you need.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The brawny Yok Huy has no idea you completed the task with ease. Look him squarely in the eye and tell him not to underestimate /me.

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_040<tab>Hmph. What's with that smirk on your face? Surely you didn't <var 1A 02 /var>actually<var 1A 01 /var> carry that miserably heavy stone all the way there... What? You did!?
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_041<tab>Well now...it seems I indeed underestimated you, and that is worthy of an apology.
TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_042<tab>First, you should know that the stone you carried was urgently needed to repair a number of graves damaged in a devastating storm not long ago.

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_043<tab>When you passed by, I merely thought to have some fun with an outsider. I did not realize I would be disrespecting a fellow warrior of great strength.

TEXT_KINGZB102_05042_STRONGYOKFUY05042_000_045<tab>Henceforth, I will not think so lightly of our visitors. Now, there are more stones that must be taken to their proper place, and I intend to do the rest of the heavy lifting myself.
